en.t2: In the Design Schema page, the blue part on the left represents the vertex model, and the green part on the right represents the edge model. The first-level child node is the name of the model, the second-level child node is the attribute of the model, and the third-level child node is the information of this attribute: whether it is nullable, and its data type.
en.t3: In the upper right corner, you can search for the name or attribute of the schema, and it will be highlighted in red on the page.
en.t4: Create a vertex model, click Add, select the corresponding data type, whether it is nullable or not, set the primary key, and it will be displayed on the page after the creation is successful.
en.t5: To create an edge model, you do not need to set the primary key, or add any attributes.
en.t6: After creating the model, we can import the data.

zh.t2: 在建模页面中，左侧蓝色部分表示点的模型，右侧绿色部分表示边的模型。一级子节点是模型的名称，二级子节点是模型的属性，三级子节点是这个属性的信息：是否可空，和他的数据类型。
zh.t3: 右上角可以搜索模型的名称或者属性，页面中会用红色高亮显示。
zh.t4: 创建顶点模型，点击添加，选择对应的数据类型，是否可空默认是否，设置主键，创建成功之后页面中就会显示出来。
zh.t5: 创建边的模型，不需要设置主键，也可以不添加任何属性。
zh.t6: 创建好模型之后，我们就可以导入数据了。
